A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No-Spoiler Review: It's a film that often doesn't conform to your expectations of what will or should happen\, and most of the time in this movie that ends up making it better. It's a darker chapter than The Force Awakens\, and not everything that happens will make the audience happy\, but there are some genuinely joyful moments for Star Wars fans. The callbacks to the original series feel like logical continuations of the saga\, not recycled for nostalgia alone.
